Package entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Double
Maze.MovingImage
entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ability, Enemy, Exit, Player
public abstract class Entity
extends MovingImage
Represents anything that is in the maze. Players, enemies, abilities
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public void receiveKnockback​(double otherX, double otherY, double otherWidth, double otherHeight, double kbMultiplier)
      Make this Entity get "bumped" by the other Entity
      Parameters:
      otherX - x position of other Creature
      otherY - y position of other Creature
      otherWidth - width of other Creature
      otherHeight - height of other Creature
      kbMultiplier - how far to be knocked back (larger value = farther push)
